label: EU Commission
desc: Provides public funding under Horizon Europe.

label: 6G-IA
desc: Industry Association. Represents private sector matching funds.

label: Eurescom
desc: Coordination & Support (CSA). Coordinator of SNS OPS & ICE.

label: Technikon (AT)
desc: Key Coordinator for Stream B projects (6GTandem, ADROIT6G).

label: CENER (ES)
desc: Spanish National Renewable Energy Centre. Coordinator of 5G-STARDUST.

label: Martel Innovate (CH)
desc: Innovation & Dissemination expert. Partner in 5G-STARDUST, UNITY-6G.

label: NextGenEU
desc: EU Recovery Instrument. Primary source for UNICO (Spain) & RESTART (Italy).

label: EDF (Defence Fund)
desc: European Defence Fund. Funding dual-use/military projects like VANTAGE.

label: BMBF (DE)
desc: German Federal Ministry. Total program volume ~€700M.

label: France 2030
desc: French National Strategy. Focused on strategic autonomy.

label: PEPR Networks
desc: Priority Research Program for Future Networks. Co-led by CEA, CNRS, IMT.

label: France 6G
desc: National platform launched by IMT to unite ecosystem & standardization.

label: Spanish Gov (UNICO)
desc: UNICO I+D 6G Program funded by NextGenEU.

label: UK Gov
desc: Wireless Infrastructure Strategy. Associated to Horizon Europe.

label: RESTART (Italy)
desc: Italian program for Future Telecoms. €118M budget.

label: FNS (Netherlands)
desc: Future Network Services. ~€203M National Growth Fund.

label: FCT (Portugal)
desc: Fundação para a Ciência e a Tecnologia. Public funding agency.

label: NCBR (Poland)
desc: National Centre for Research and Development. Polish funding agency.

label: Polish Presidency '25
desc: EU Council Presidency 2025. Pushing 'Digital Networks Act'.

label: Silicon Austria Labs
desc: Austria's top research center for EBS. Focus on 6G Sensing & Hardware.

label: SERI (Switzerland)
desc: Swiss State Secretariat for Education. Funds Swiss partners in SNS JU (e.g. 6G-XR).

label: Nokia
desc: Leading Hexa-X, 6G-ANNA. Chair of 6G-IA. Coordinator of SUSTAIN-6G.

label: Ericsson
desc: Tech Manager in Hexa-X. Coordinator of ROBUST-6G, DETERMINISTIC6G & TrialsNet.

label: Orange
desc: Major French Operator. Active in PEPR & France 6G.

label: Telefónica
desc: Major operator. Heavily involved in UNICO, 6G-IA & PREDICT-6G.

label: Thales
desc: Security & Space. Key player in French ecosystem.

label: IS-Wireless
desc: Polish pioneer in Open RAN & 6G technologies.

label: Orange PL
desc: Orange Poland. Active innovation arm in Warsaw.

label: LMT (Latvia)
desc: Latvian Mobile Telephone. Leading VANTAGE drone project.

label: Altice Labs (PT)
desc: Innovation center in Aveiro. Focus on optical networks.

label: WINGS ICT (GR)
desc: SME Coordinator of CONFIDENTIAL6G. Partner in Hexa-X-II.

label: Telekom Slovenije
desc: Leading Slovenian operator. Advanced 5G SA & innovation pilot.

label: Siemens
desc: Focus on Industrial 6G & Digital Twins. Partner in SUSTAIN-6G & 6G-ANNA.

label: John Deere
desc: Smart Agriculture. Partner in SUSTAIN-6G for vertical use cases.

label: OTE (Greece)
desc: Greek Telecom. Key partner in 6G-PATH pilots.

label: Atos (Eviden)
desc: Digital integration giant. Key partner in SUNRISE-6G.

label: Greenerwave (FR)
desc: Deeptech startup. Hardware provider for RIS surfaces.

label: SNCF (FR)
desc: French Railways. Vertical user for RIS.

label: Stellantis (IT/FR)
desc: Automotive giant. Vertical user for RIS.

label: Iquadrat (ES)
desc: SME focused on network simulation. Partner in 6G-BRICKS.

label: Nextworks (IT)
desc: SME specialized in SDN/NFV orchestration. Partner in 6G-INTENSE.

label: 5G-STARDUST
desc: Stream A: 5G Evolution + NTN. Coord: CENER.

label: 6Green
desc: Stream A: Green Technologies. Coord: CNIT.

label: NANCY
desc: Stream A: Secure Intelligent Networks. Coord: UOWM.

label: 6G-SHINE
desc: Stream B: In-X Subnetworks. Coord: Aalborg Univ.

label: 6GTandem
desc: Stream B: Dual Frequency Distributed MIMO. Coord: Technikon.

label: ADROIT6G
desc: Stream B: AI-driven Open Programmable Architecture. Coord: Technikon.

label: CENTRIC

label: CONFIDENTIAL6G

label: DESIRE6G
desc: Stream B: Deep Programmability. Coord: Univ Amsterdam.

label: DETERMINISTIC6G
desc: Stream B: Deterministic Communication. Coord: Ericsson.

label: FLEX-SCALE
desc: Stream B: Optical X-haul. Coord: Univ Patras.

label: Hexa-X-II
desc: Stream B: Flagship Blueprint. Coord: Nokia.

label: HORSE
desc: Stream B: Human-Centric Security. Coord: CNIT.

label: PREDICT-6G
desc: Stream B: Multi-domain Deterministic. Coord: UC3M.

label: PRIVATEER
desc: Stream B: Privacy-First Security. Coord: Space Hellas.

label: RIGOUROUS

label: SUPERIOT

label: TERA6G

desc: Stream B: THz Reconfigurable Surfaces. Coord: INESC TEC.

label: TIMES
desc: Stream B: THz Industrial Mesh. Coord: CNIT.

desc: Stream C: Experimentation Facility. Coord: ISI/Athena.

label: 6G-SANDBOX
desc: Stream C: Pan-European Testbed. Coord: Keysight.

label: TARGET-X
desc: Stream D: Vertical Trials (Auto, Energy). Coord: Fraunhofer IPT.

label: TrialsNet
desc: Stream D: Large Scale Pilots. Coord: Ericsson.

label: SNS ICE
desc: CSA: International & European Cooperation. Coord: Eurescom.

desc: Sustainability Lighthouse Project. Led by Nokia, Orange & Eurescom.

label: SUNRISE-6G
desc: Federation of 6G Infrastructures. Coordinated by ISI/Athena (Greece).

label: 6G-VERSUS
desc: Sustainability & Vertical Pilots (Bulgaria, Greece). Led by Univ. Oulu.

label: 6G-PATH
desc: Pilots & Trials in Health, Education, Farming & Cities.

label: 6G-INTENSE
desc: Native AI for Intent-based Networking (Call 2). Coordinated by CTTC.

label: 6G-TWIN
desc: Digital Twin for 6G networks. Coordinated by LIST.

label: 6G Flagship
desc: Univ. of Oulu (FI). Pioneer of 6G vision.

label: CNIT (Italy)
desc: National Consortium. Coordinator of 6Green, HORSE, TIMES.

label: NKUA (GR)
desc: Univ. of Athens. RIS control theory.

label: Eurecom (FR)
desc: Leading telecom research center. Coord of SNS OPS.

label: CTTC (ES)
desc: Centre Tecnològic de Telecomunicacions de Catalunya. Coord of 6G-INTENSE.

label: UOWM (GR)
desc: Univ. Western Macedonia. Coord of NANCY.

label: Eurecat (ES)
desc: Tech Centre of Catalonia. Coord of SUPERIOT.

label: UC3M (ES)
desc: Univ Carlos III Madrid. Coord of PREDICT-6G, TERA6G.

label: ENABLE-6G
desc: Privacy & Energy Efficiency. Led by IMDEA Networks.
